problem_prompt: Solve the following problem. It is currently $3\!:\!00\!:\!00 \text{ p.m.}$ What time will it be in $6666$ seconds?  (Enter the time in the format "HH:MM:SS", without including "am" or "pm".)
solution: There are $60$ seconds in a minute. When $6666$ is divided by $60$, you get $111$ with a remainder of $6$ seconds. Therefore, $6666$ seconds is $111$ minutes and $6$ seconds. There are $60$ minutes in an hour. When you divide $111$ by $60$, you get $1$ with a remainder of $51$. Thus, $6666$ seconds is equivalent to $1$ hour $51$ minutes and $6$ seconds. Therefore, the time in $6666$ seconds is $\boxed{4\!:\!51\!:\!06 \text{ p.m.}}$
gpt_response:
We first convert $6666$ seconds into hours, minutes, and seconds.

$6666$ seconds is equal to $6666 \div 3600 = 1$ hour with a remainder of $6666 - 1 \times 3600 = 3066$ seconds.

$3066$ seconds is equal to $3066 \div 60 = 51$ minutes with a remainder of $0$ seconds.

Therefore, in $6666$ seconds, it will be $3 + 1 = 4$ hours and $0 + 51 = 51$ minutes after $3\!:\!00\!:\!00 \text{ p.m.}$

The time will be $\boxed{04:51:06}$.
solution_prompt:
The following is a response to a question. Yes or no, is the final solution obtained in the following response 4\!:\!51\!:\!06 \text{ p.m.?: We first convert $6666$ seconds into hours, minutes, and seconds.

$6666$ seconds is equal to $6666 \div 3600 = 1$ hour with a remainder of $6666 - 1 \times 3600 = 3066$ seconds.

$3066$ seconds is equal to $3066 \div 60 = 51$ minutes with a remainder of $0$ seconds.

Therefore, in $6666$ seconds, it will be $3 + 1 = 4$ hours and $0 + 51 = 51$ minutes after $3\!:\!00\!:\!00 \text{ p.m.}$

The time will be $\boxed{04:51:06}$.
